description:
Introducing the ultra-comfortable Bridger 5-panel cap, ready for any adventure. Crafted with plush fleece and durable nylon taslan, it features a moisture-wicking sweatband inside and a flexible shock cord back adjuster for a perfect fit.

  • Retro-style fleece with color-blocked nylon panels and a woven orienteering patch for a unique and stylish look
  • Flexible EVA brim
name: Coal The Bridger - Unisex
